law.text:
The purpose of this subtitle is:
to create and maintain an accurate and efficient criminal justice information system in the State consistent with:
applicable federal law and regulations;
the need of criminal justice units in the State for accurate and current criminal history record information; and
the right of persons to be free from improper and unwarranted intrusions into their privacy; and
to provide a basic statutory framework within which the objectives of § 10-202 of this subtitle can be attained.
